title: The_Crypto_Kid
author: The_Crypto_Kid
content: Hello! I have identified that I have 2 of these and as it was a gift to me, I would like to give it to someone in the forum community.I asked my grandpa @MoparMiningLLC to help me set up this raffle.There will be 16 slots, first come first serve. only one per person - please no alt accounts. A block will be selected after all slots are filled and the last character in the block hash will determine the winner.Item will be given to minerjones for reshippingGood luck to everyone!   BTC

comments.author: The_Crypto_Kid
comments.body: this is now full, I will use block 818332 to determine winner. Good luck to all!   BTC

comments.author: The_Crypto_Kid
comments.body: Quote from: doblezero on November 24, 2023, 10:56:56 PMA doblezeroThanksblock hash:00000000000000000001c37c2a3744ab05e1715e5157b26a3bcf1625a6afa47aand we have a winner with doblezero congratulations and thank you to everyone who participated.
